synopsis.native: A Strasbourg, Marie se prostitue depuis 20 ans. Elle a son bout de trottoir, ses habitués, sa liberté. Et un fils, Adrien, 17 ans. Pour assurer son avenir, Marie veut lui payer des études. Il lui faut de l'argent, vite.
synopsis.english: Marie is an independent prostitute, a joyful member of the sex workers union, and a single mother. When her son, who's passionate about cooking, gets kicked out of school, she enrols him in a top French cookery program. But her contagious optimism isn't enough to pay the fees and sacrifices must be made. Will she succeed?
